Behrouz Khiali

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/0650743339403775
  • Última atualização do currículo em 04/12/2015

Graduated from University of Sao Paulo- Institute of Astronomy (IAG)- Working in high energy astrophysics. Master of science (2009- Physics) from Tarbiat Modares University (Tehran- Iran) in General Relativity and Gravity (Investigation on gravitational waves). Bachelor of science (2005- Physics) from Iran University Science and Technology (IUST, Tehran-Iran), the project was about Free electron lasers. I got INFN research fellowship in University of Pisa (2010-2011, Italy) working on "GALILEO GALILEI" (GG) Small Space Project for Testing the Equivalence Principle of Einstein. Interested in studying astroparticle, high energy astrophysics, AGNs, Magnetic reconnection, MHD turbulence theories (Texto informado pelo autor)

Outras informações
I was in Galileo Galilei on the Ground Laboratory (GGG) at Pisa University as researcher. An experiment for testing the Equivalence Principle (EP) it's defined by INFN (Instituto Nazionale di Fisica Nucleare). I was awarded a research scholarship by INFN for one year. At GGG lab, we designed an experiment to test the EP, my duty in this project was producing a code by using MATLAB and MATHEMATICA programming to measure some parameters of the experiment.
